Articles.Content:
So I made the plunge and bought .90. Signed up on the KSP site. Paid for it via PayPal. Have the receipt. But I don't have the game. Never received the email with download instructions. When I try to log in, it tells me there is no account with my email address. I contacted KSP Support, but they have not responded. I really want to get started playing this weekend. Can anyone help me with this?

thanks,

Andrew
Hi, soifua. Would you mind PMing me with the email address you used? I'll poke someone to check any purchase records. Thanks.

Log into your account on www.kerbalspaceprogram.com

Click 'My Account'

Click Download
